data.value:
Dear Paul,

Thank you for your help with this part of my Potentialife Leadership Development program.

As mentioned in the email, I am reaching out to people I know to gather stories about where and how I have been most successful in the past.

Specifically:

  • I am looking for a story from you about a time when you saw me at my best. What strengths did you see me using and how was I using them to my advantage?
  • I am also looking for completion of the 'Relationships Survey'. The survey consists of 38 questions and should take no more than 5-10 minutes to complete

data.label: Enter your strengths story for Matthew Arnold:
data.name: strengths
